content.question: The function f is continuous on the closed interval <math> <mrow> <mrow> <mo> [ </mo> <mrow> <mn> 2 </mn> <mo> , </mo> <mn> 13 </mn> </mrow> <mo> ] </mo> </mrow> </mrow> </math> and has values as shown in the table above. skill.text: Skill 1.F: Explain how an approximated value relates to the actual value.
